pkgmetadata.longdescription: Applied Psychometric Theory // Provides tools useful for measurement theory (Allen Yen 2001)ISBN: 157766230X, meta- analysis (validity-generalization) (Schmidt Hunter)doi:10.4135/9781483398105, reliability, item analysis, inter-rater reliability, classical utility, and correlation analysis (Cohen et. al. 2003)doi:10.4324/9780203774441.
